description: Generates a list of Non-Player Characters (NPCs) for a Tabletop Roleplaying Game (TTRPG) encounter outline.  The token `xxxXXXOOOXXXxxx` will be used to separate each NPC.

input_variables.name: game_system
input_variables.description: The TTRPG game system for which the encounter is designed.

input_variables.name: encounter_outline
input_variables.description: A one paragraph outline of the encounter for which NPCs will be generated.
